thread.section_title: Parkway Cars Perton Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Parkway Cars Perton | parkwaycarsperton.co.uk
thread.title: Jade Cumming
thread.title_full: Parkway Cars Perton reviewed by Jade Cumming

author: Jade Cumming
title: Jade Cumming
text: Arrived on time with an amazingly presented car, smartly dressed driver who couldn't have been more friendly and talkative. Reasonably priced and was able to pay by card!! Which is a god send! Overall incredibly happy. Will be using them again and will definitely recommend.
